summary: This is an email chain from October 28, 2019, regarding the scheduling of a meeting with Mark Epstein. An Assistant United States Attorney from the Southern District of New York confirms a meeting for October 31, 2019, at 3:00 p.m., following confusion about a missed meeting on October 28.

persons.name: Mark Epstein
persons.context: The email chain is about scheduling a meeting with him, indicating he is a person of interest to the U.S. Attorney's office.

events.title: Missed Meeting with Mark Epstein
events.description: A meeting with Mark Epstein was scheduled for 3:00 p.m. but was missed, leading to scheduling confusion.

events.title: Rescheduled Meeting with Mark Epstein
events.description: A meeting with Mark Epstein is rescheduled for 3:00 p.m. on October 31, 2019.

keyFacts: An Assistant United States Attorney from the SDNY was attempting to schedule a meeting with Mark Epstein in late October 2019.
A confirmed meeting for October 28, 2019, at 3:00 p.m. was missed, causing confusion.
The meeting was rescheduled for October 31, 2019, at 3:00 p.m.
The document shows ongoing legal interest in Mark Epstein by federal prosecutors in 2019.
